kpi.name: M1008C296

kpi_info.title: MBLB IFHO ATTEMPTS WITH UE BAND CAPA
kpi_info.use: The number of Multi-Band Load Balancing (MBLB) IFHO attempts with UE band capability as highest trigger weight. UPDATED: When the handover control starts inter-frequency handover attempt due to UE band capability had highest weighting factor. If L3 rejects the handover attempt with cause "parallel procedures not allowed", the counter is not updated.

kpi.kpi_alias: MBLB IFHO ATTEMPTS WITH UE BAND CAPA
